sentences.sContent: The brain itself does not fossilise, but the inside of the cranium retains an impression of its contours.
sentences.sContent_eng: The brain itself does not fossilise, but the inside of the cranium retains an impression of its contours.
sentences.sCn: 脑部分本身是不会变成化石的，但在头盖骨内部却还保留着脑的轮廓。

words.tran: 有头盖的；有头动物的；脊椎动物的

trans.tranOther: the part of your head that is made of bone and covers your brain
